sentences.sContent: Karen followed the pair onto the patio and watched as they settled at a round table under a burgundy window awning.
sentences.sContent_eng: Karen followed the pair onto the patio and watched as they settled at a round table under a burgundy window awning.
sentences.sCn: 凯伦跟随这两个人来到庭院，看着他们在一个酒红色遮阳篷下的圆桌旁坐下。

sentences.sContent: At the Motosumiyoshi commuter-train station in Kawasaki, a suburb of Tokyo, sleek solar panels serve as an awning over the platform.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the Motosumiyoshi commuter-train station in Kawasaki, a suburb of Tokyo, sleek solar panels serve as an awning over the platform.
sentences.sCn: 在东京郊区川崎的元住吉通勤列车站，平滑的太阳能电池板在月台上被用作遮阳篷和雨篷。

trans.tranOther: a sheet of material outside a shop, tent etc to keep off the sun or the rain
